actions.text: Amendment SA 1878 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 1878 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Loeffler to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4191) To authorize certain postgraduate health care employees and health professions trainees of the Department of Veterans Affairs to provide treatment via telemedicine.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1878 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Loeffler to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1878 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To authorize certain postgraduate health care employees and health professions trainees of the Department of Veterans Affairs to provide treatment via telemedicine.
